Text: This is your 4th upload of the same movie...? Come on please, you are VIP - at least comment if the quality is better than the last three (3) uploads of the same movie. tx
run time on this movie is 1h 37mins, this is a bit short methinks...

Audio and video quality is solid; a bit dark in a few spots, but for the most part you still decipher what's onscreen. There's a few moments of Japanese dialogue with no English subs, but this is a "Resident Evil" movie, so it's all about the action. And as far as the previous post about the runtime, I can confirm that this is the entire movie; the only thing missing is the end credits, which would account for the shortened runtime. Great job!
